# 六.动画

# 1.animation

# 2.transltion

# 3.案例

3d 旋转色子

# 代码

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6
<style>
.box0 li {
  list-style: none;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  line-height: 100px;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 80px;
  color: white;
  position: absolute;
}
.box0 {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  transform-origin: 50% 50% 50px;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  animation: rote 5s ease-in infinite normal;
}
.box0 .box1 {
  top: -50px;
  left: 50px;
  transform-origin: bottom;
  transform: rotateX(-90deg);
  background: red;
}
.box0 .box2 {
  top: 50px;
  left: 150px;
  transform-origin: left;
  transform: rotateY(-90deg);
  background: blue;
}
.box0 .box3 {
  top: 50px;
  left: 50px;
  background: yellow;
}
.box0 .box4 {
  top: 50px;
  left: 50px;
  transform-origin: right;
  transform: translateZ(100px);
  background: orange;
}
.box0 .box5 {
  left: -50px;
  top: 50px;
  transform-origin: right;
  transform: rotateY(90deg);
  background: pink;
}
.box0 .box6 {
  top: 150px;
  left: 50px;
  transform-origin: top;
  transform: rotateX(90deg);
  background: black;
}
@-webkit-keyframes rote {
  0% {
    transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotateX(360deg) rotateY(360deg);
  }
}
</style>
<template>
  <ul class="box0">
    <li class="box1">1</li>
    <li class="box2">2</li>
    <li class="box3">3</li>
    <li class="box4">4</li>
    <li class="box5">5</li>
    <li class="box6">6</li>
  </ul>
</template>
